term.title: neodymium laser

item.text: A CW pulsed laser emitting radiation from excited Nd3+ principally occurring around 1.06 µm (the precise position depends on the matrix). The Nd3+ is present as a dopant in suitable crystals (e.g. yttrium–aluminium garnet, YAG) or in suitable glasses (phosphate, silicate, etc.).
